overview: Four medical students from Jakarta, Bima, Gaga, Sela and Bibi does research on medicinal plants on the island of Bangka. In this research, Bima asks Via, the children of the Ikatan Cinta Orphanage and Ana et al for help. While searching for medicinal plants, Fika gets lost and is bullied by Ana et al. Bima stops the process of searching for medicinal plants and looks for Fika. In addition, the orphanage will be confiscated because it is in debt.
title: Bangka I'm in Love
